title: Vishwanath Bondre
text: Vishwanath Bondre (25 November 1936 – 8 January 2014) was an Indian <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er. He played 28 <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class</a> matches for <a href="Mumbai%20cricket%20team">Mumbai</a> and <a href="Associated%20Cement%20Company%20cricket%20team">Associated Cement Company</a> between 1961 and 1972.
